## Tuple.Filter type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Filter<T extends Tuple, U extends Item<T>> = T extends readonly [
        infer H,
        ...infer R
    ] ? H extends U ? [H, ...Filter<R, U>] : Filter<R, U> : Empty;
```
